localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We fixed the Clubhouse event links preview on social media 👋 ⠀ Copy-paste your event URL and we'll auto-generate image + share link ⠀ ✅ Real preview image ✅ Working “open in app” button ✅ Event analytics ⠀ We build it in our free time; all feedback welcome 🤙
blogPost.body: We fixed the Clubhouse event links preview on social media 👋 ⠀ Copy-paste your event URL and we'll auto-generate image + share link ⠀ ✅ Real preview image ✅ Working “open in app” button ✅ Event analytics ⠀ We build it in our free time; all feedback welcome 🤙
blogPost.title: Clubhype - Social media previews and landing pages for Clubhouse events
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 我们修复了社交媒体上的会所活动链接预览 👋 ⠀ 复制粘贴你的活动网址，我们会自动生成图片+分享链接 ⠀✅ 真实预览图片 ✅ 工作中的 "在应用中打开 "按钮 ✅ 活动分析 ⠀ 我们在空闲时间建立它；欢迎所有反馈 🤙。
localize.tagline: 社交媒体预览和会所活动的登陆页面。

localize.description: 我們修復了社交媒體上的會所活動鏈接預覽 👋 ⠀ 複製粘貼你的活動網址，我們會自動生成圖片+分享鏈接 ⠀✅ 真實預覽圖片 ✅ 工作中的 "在應用中打開 "按鈕 ✅ 活動分析 ⠀ 我們在空閒時間建立它；歡迎所有反饋 🤙。
localize.tagline: 社交媒體預覽和會所活動的登陸頁面。

previous.excerpt: Make smarter trades by getting real-time alerts from Contora that are triggered by data from unusual sources — such as Reddit mentions, recent company jobs postings and firings, viral posts on social media, and much more.
previous.title: Contora - Better trades with real-time data from unusual sources

localize.description: 通过从Contora获得实时警报，使交易更加智能，这些警报由来自不寻常来源的数据触发--例如Reddit提及、最近的公司工作岗位发布和解雇、社交媒体上的病毒性帖子等等。
localize.tagline: 利用来自不同寻常来源的实时数据进行更好的交易

localize.description: 通過從Contora獲得實時警報，使交易更加智能，這些警報由來自不尋常來源的數據觸發--例如Reddit提及、最近的公司工作崗位發佈和解僱、社交媒體上的病毒性帖子等等。
localize.tagline: 利用來自不同尋常來源的實時數據進行更好的交易

next.excerpt: Zealth is building a software to help hospitals provide continuous round the clock monitoring to their cancer patients, once they leave the hospital and alerts them if the patient is at high risk.
next.title: Zealth - SaaS for remote monitoring of cancer patients

localize.description: Zealth正在打造一款软件，帮助医院为癌症患者提供连续的全天候监测，一旦患者离开医院，如果患者处于高危状态，就会发出警报。
Zealth正在打造一款軟件，幫助醫院爲癌症患者提供連續的全天候監測，一旦患者離開醫院，如果患者處於高危狀態，就會發出警報。
